help-file.title: RECALL
help-file.content:
Syntax: recall [<number> | <pattern>]
Use this command to search for private messages, ie. tells, group-says or gccs you have received. Number specifies the amount of lines to display, pattern can be given to list only matching lines, for example containing name of whoever told you something. Remember to include * characters in pattern, for example 'recall *joe*' will list all messages from player called Joe.
